channel.title: Mapping on BMMB 554 | 2018
channel.description: Recent content in Mapping on BMMB 554 | 2018

item.title: First analysis
item.description: Our first actual analysis Trajectories for the four teams in this class: Team 1 Team 2 Team 3 Team 4 10.

item.title: Diving into analyses
item.description: Setting up Jupyter For our analyses we will be using Jupyter. The problem is that everyone in this class has a different computer setup, which may cause issues with running Jupyter.

item.title: Aligning many sequences quickly
item.description: Speeding things up The topics we discussed in the past lecture explain fundamental concepts behind analysis of biological sequences. Today, we will be talking about algorithms that allow aligning billions of sequencing reads against reference genomes.
